Question: BIONET America Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
BIONET America Inc.

Product: SonoMe Wireless Ultrasound and EvoPatch Wearable Healthcare Solution

- SonoMe: FDA approved new wireless ultrasound with Wi-Fi connectivity and dual head for high-quality imaging.
- EvoPatch: Wearable healthcare solution for real-time vital signs monitoring with up to 72 hours of cordless use.
